sentences.sentence: All clearance adjustment is manual or motorize.

sentences.sentence: But hes trying to power it, or motorize it, with a drill. (Laughter) And the question he had is, "Can I do it?"
sentences.translation: 但是他尝试著赋予它力量，或者说使它机动化，通过一个电钻(笑声)他的疑问是，“我真的能这样做吗？”
